data.comment: The first-half is under way at Bosuilstadion - Antwerp kick-off to start the match.
Goal! Krepin Diatta gives Brugge a 0-1 lead.
In the minute 16, Jeremy Gelin (Antwerp) has been shown a straight red card by referee Nicolas Laforge.
Aurelio Buta is on a sub for Koji Miyoshi for Antwerp.
Nicolas Laforge blows to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The ref has blown to start the second-half. Brugge kick-off.
Goal! Brugge extend their lead to 0-2 through Mats Rits.
Martin Hongla (Antwerp) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 56, Eder Balanta (Brugge) gets a yellow card.
Philippe Clement (Brugge) is making a first substitution, with Simon Deli replacing Eder Balanta.
Alexis De Sart is replacing Lior Refaelov for the home team.
In the minute 71, The home team have replaced Martin Hongla with Louis Verstraete. This is the third substitution made today by Ivan Leko.
At Bosuilstadion, Dylan Batubinsika has been yellow-carded for the home team.
David Okereke is replacing Noa Lang for Brugge at Bosuilstadion.
In the minute 82, Dieumerci Mbokani is booked for the home team.
